title: New Year: Friends Highs & Lows
description: The ultimate year recap for friends. Share the Ls on the front, celebrate the Ws on the back.

cards.content: What was the biggest 'L' (loss) the group took this year?
cards.back: What was the biggest 'W' (win)?

cards.content: Who had the worst dating life?
cards.back: Who had the biggest glow up?

cards.content: What was the worst trend we participated in?
cards.back: What was the best trend?

cards.content: What was the most chaotic night out?
cards.back: What was the most wholesome hangout?

cards.content: What was the dumbest purchase made?
cards.back: What was the best investment?

cards.content: What song did we overplay until we hated it?
cards.back: What was the song of the year?

cards.content: Who was the drama queen this year?
cards.back: Who was the peacemaker?

cards.content: What was a movie we all hated?
cards.back: What was a movie we all loved?

cards.content: What is a resolution you failed immediately?
cards.back: What is a goal you actually crushed?

cards.content: What was the worst food we ate together?
cards.back: What was the best meal of the year?

cards.content: Who got too drunk this year?
cards.back: Who was the responsible MVP?

cards.content: What was a plan that got cancelled?
cards.back: What was a spontaneous plan that ruled?

cards.content: What is a slang word we need to retire?
cards.back: What is a phrase we should keep using?

cards.content: Who spent too much money?
cards.back: Who made the most money moves?

cards.content: What was the cringiest moment?
cards.back: What was the coolest moment?

cards.content: What is a habit we need to break as a group?
cards.back: What is a tradition we need to start?

cards.content: Who disappeared/ghosted the group the most?
cards.back: Who was always there when we needed them?

cards.content: What was the worst weather we endured?
cards.back: What was the most beautiful day?

cards.content: What celebrity scandal annoyed us?
cards.back: What celebrity win did we love?

cards.content: What was the most boring part of the year?
cards.back: What was the most exciting?

cards.content: Who had the worst haircut?
cards.back: Who had the best style evolution?

cards.content: What is a memory you want to forget?
cards.back: What is a memory you want to frame?

cards.content: What app did we waste time on?
cards.back: What app actually helped us?

cards.content: What is a prediction from last year that was wrong?
cards.back: What is a prediction for next year?

cards.content: Who slept the most?
cards.back: Who hustled the hardest?

cards.content: What is an ex we need to stop talking about?
cards.back: Who is a new crush we approve of?

cards.content: What was the biggest misunderstanding?
cards.back: How close are we now?

cards.content: What destination did we miss out on?
cards.back: Where are we going next year?

cards.content: What is something we complained about too much?
cards.back: What is something we are grateful for?

cards.content: Who is most likely to get arrested next year?
cards.back: Who is most likely to be a millionaire?

cards.content: What was the worst advice we followed?
cards.back: What was the best advice we gave each other?

cards.content: What is a secret that came out this year?
cards.back: Toast to honesty!

cards.content: What is a risk that didn't pay off?
cards.back: What is a lesson learned the hard way?

cards.content: Who cried the most?
cards.back: Who laughed the most?

cards.content: What is one thing we leave in this year?
cards.back: What is one thing we bring to next year?

cards.content: Who has the worst sleep schedule?
cards.back: Who has the most energy?

cards.content: What was the most stressful month?
cards.back: What was the chillest month?

cards.content: What was a joke that went too far?
cards.back: What is an inside joke we love?

cards.content: Who is the biggest flake?
cards.back: Who is the ride or die?

cards.content: What is a fear we conquered?
cards.back: What is a dream we are chasing?

cards.content: Who took the worst photos?
cards.back: Who is the designated photographer?

cards.content: What is a show we binged and regretted?
cards.back: What is a show we recommend to everyone?

cards.content: What was the most awkward encounter?
cards.back: What was the smoothest moment?

cards.content: What is something we took for granted?
cards.back: Cheers to what we have.

cards.content: Who changed the most (personality)?
cards.back: Who stayed true to themselves?

cards.content: What is the biggest lie we told ourselves?
cards.back: What is the truth we are living now?

cards.content: If this year was a color, what ugly color was it?
cards.back: What beautiful color will next year be?

cards.content: Are we getting old?
cards.back: No, we are getting iconic.

cards.content: Ready for the new year?
cards.back: Let's go!

cards.content: Cheers to...
cards.back: The best friends in the world.
